content:
# FACTORIO REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System (around x=-5.0, y=2.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump at position (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) facing RIGHT
- Boiler at position (x=-5.0, y=2.5) facing RIGHT (fueled with coal)
- Steam engine at position (x=0.5, y=6.5) facing RIGHT
- Small electric pole at position (x=0.5, y=8.5)
- Improved pipe network with direct pipe connection between boiler and steam engine
  - Previous complex pipe network was removed and replaced with a more direct connection

### Iron Mining and Smelting (around x=18.5, y=74.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric mining drill at position (x=18.5, y=74.5) facing DOWN
- Stone furnace at position (x=19.0, y=77.0) - currently out of fuel
- Inserter at position (x=19.5, y=78.5) facing DOWN
- Small electric pole at position (x=20.5, y=77.5)
- Small electric pole at position (x=17.5, y=72.5)
- Iron chest at position (x=19.5, y=79.5) for iron plate storage containing 454 iron plates
- Additional wooden chest at position (x=19.5, y=80.5)

### Copper Mining and Smelting (around x=-48.5, y=79.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric mining drill at position (x=-48.5, y=79.5) facing DOWN
- Stone furnace at position (x=-48.0, y=82.0) - fueled with coal
- Inserter at position (x=-47.5, y=83.5) facing DOWN
- Small electric pole at position (x=-46.5, y=77.5)
- Small electric pole at position (x=-46.5, y=82.5)
- Copper chest at position (x=-47.5, y=84.5) for copper plate storage containing 274 copper plates
- Additional wooden chest at position (x=-47.5, y=85.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production (around x=25.5, y=25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine for copper cables at position (x=25.5, y=25.5)
- Wooden chest at position (x=22.5, y=25.5) for copper plate input containing 38 copper plates
- Input inserter at position (x=23.5, y=25.5) facing RIGHT
- Assembling machine for electronic circuits at position (x=30.5, y=25.5)
- Inserter at position (x=28.5, y=25.5) facing RIGHT to transfer copper cables between assemblers
- Input inserter for iron plates at position (x=29.5, y=23.5) facing DOWN
- Input wooden chest at position (x=29.5, y=22.5) for iron plates containing 5 iron plates
- Output inserter at position (x=32.5, y=25.5) facing RIGHT
- Output wooden chest at position (x=33.5, y=25.5) containing 30 electronic circuits
- Small electric pole at position (x=25.5, y=27.5)
- Small electric pole at position (x=30.5, y=27.5)
- Small electric pole at position (x=28.5, y=23.5) near iron input inserter

### Electricity Network
An extensive electricity network connecting most powered structures with multiple small electric poles distributed across the map. The network has been expanded with intermediate poles at:
- Position (x=5.5, y=10.5)
- Position (x=10.5, y=15.5)
- Position (x=20.5, y=60.5)
- Position (x=22.5, y=50.5)
- Position (x=24.5, y=40.5)
- Position (x=25.5, y=30.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities on occupied tiles
- Always check if a tile is already occupied before placing an entity
